Label.en: To add that, unlike Britain and some other countries, they didn't have access to vast stores of coal under their feet
Label.fr: De plus, à l'opposé de Angleterre et de quelques autres pays, le sous-sol de la France ne regorgeait pas de charbon et de minerai
Label.es: To add that, unlike Britain and some other countries, they didn't have access to vast stores of coal under their feet
Label.zh: To add that, unlike Britain and some other countries, they didn't have access to vast stores of coal under their feet

Label.en: So they had to buy it from the other countries... who they had just been warring with in the last few decades...
Label.fr: Il fallait acheter tout cela aux pays voisins... avec lesquels il y avait eu quelques guerres
Label.es: So they had to buy it from the other countries... who they had just been warring with in the last few decades...
Label.zh: So they had to buy it from the other countries... who they had just been warring with in the last few decades...

Label.en: All that said, France managed to join in on the industrial fun late in the 19th century
Label.fr: Cela étant la France s'est légèrement rattrapée à la fin du 19e... et avait besoin de le montrer...
Label.es: All that said, France managed to join in on the industrial fun late in the 19th century
Label.zh: All that said, France managed to join in on the industrial fun late in the 19th century
